snippet.title: Pinnacle Point: Official Announcement Trailer (English)
snippet.description:
Aron must uncover the mystery of his lost brother's involvement with a soulless corporation promising immortality, only to discover it comes with a terrible price. 

A third person adventure-horror game set in an alternate 1990's atmosphere.

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2875410/Pinnacle_Point/

PressKit: https://www.ready2rungames.com/pinnacle-point-press-kit/
